channel.title: fish on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Fish shell
item.description: Fish shell looks interesting to me since it makes handling of space in the filename a lot simpler and have simple but powerful string manipulation with PCRE2. Fish shell Fish Documentation Fish Tutorial Fish Command reference Fisher Awesome fish Other resources differences from bash fish shellを使う fish shellで文字列操作 Debimate … fishへ移行 fish shellのconfig.fish fish_configでブラウザが起動しない Let me make a simple deployment memo for Debian.
